text: The People's Defence Forces (, HPG) is the military wing of the Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK). The HPG replaced the People's Liberation Army of Kurdistan (, ARGK) which used to be the military wing of PKK. In 2014, the HPG was in the fight against the Islamic State (ISIS) in the Sinjar Mountains. ==References== Category:Kurdish organizations Category:Rebel militia groups in Asia
title: People's Defence Forces
